author: silviodonato
body:
This PR makes the code safe for missing collections.
The problematic collections were offlineJetTagHandlerPF and offlineJetTagHandlerCalo.

The PR also change the input collection of the offlineCSV from combinedInclusiveSecondaryVertexV2BJetTags (now it is missing) to pfCombinedInclusiveSecondaryVertexV2BJetTags .

This PR has been backported with #11307 and #11306
title: HLT BTV DQM offline - safe for missing collections
